TopicTitle: Your avatar is stuck in an elevator with the above poster's avatar, what do you do?

Articles.Content:
Yeah... ICE CREAM FOR EVERYONE !

*Ice Cream storm starts on the elevator*
*brain freeze*

*Internal Polar Core leak*

Oh Sh*t.... has anyone a Stupidanium-Insulated Metal Shell? Im starting to melt...... HALP!

Steals the Met.

Returns the previously stolen met. Will a Met helmet work?

Well im a Mega Man-Inspired Robot master and i have seen people getting mad whit their helmets uh.....

*Takes the helmet*

NOW IM INDESTRUCTIBLE MUAHHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAAH!!!!!!!
*shakes his head* crazy robots helmets are for deranged lunatics *steals the helmet and tosses it down the elevator shaft* there

Sits in the corner. alone.

PLEASE ONLY POST IN THIS THREAD IF YOU HAVE AN AVATAR, OR IT'S NO FUN.
rocket science party

NO!!! MY EVIL POWER!!!!!!

Expect a terrible dead...... And no ice cream for you invisible man!

MUAHHAHAHAHAHAHHA!!!!!!!!!

You don't want to give me icecream.

You want to go home and rethink your life.
What? But everyone except the invisible man are able to get ice cream for FREE!
I'm not invisible, you can clearly see me, right?

You are NOT who am saying!

*Takes a potato from the air vent*
"Can I have ice cream?"

Bronies because ponies are just as awesome as elephants and flaming pigs

(and just because I have to put something in here that goes with my avatar)( and if you're wondering about flaming pigs just ask)

What foul sorcery is this how do you still live? Repent foul demons

Umm Im just going play with this transformer.

http://www.tfw2005.com/transformers-news/attach/4/2/0/1/1/Transformers-Hunt-For-The-Decepticons-Hubcap-08_1272332035.jpg

*Sits on the transformer whitout noticing it*

Well This place is getting boring.... And this seat is not comfortable! I DEMAND A BETTER ONE!

*Throws the potato to the elevator door*
I sit in the corner and cry during the insuing chaos of a perfectly good potato getting thrown my a mega-man maniac in to a door, pick it up and eat it.

*Uses the power of magic to banish ice cream man from the elevator*

"There, all better now."

*Appears again from the air vent*

I found a Magic taco when i was banished.... NOW IM MAGIC-PROOF MUAHAHAHAHAHAHA!!!..... Erhh... and im Snow Man!

*Gets a liquid hidrogen tank from the air vent*
i can has ice cream?
"no, you no get ice cream"
and you get out of elevator or whatever void thing we're in now.... PUNT

"NERVA!"

*gets nerva engine and fires it into your face*
Still sitting and weeping, eatin' a potato.
